detail_desc: Short A-line dress in a pleated weave with a double-layered front. Opening at the back and a stand-up collar with a wide tie that ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Top in airy viscose jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.

High-waisted suit trousers in softly draping twill with side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button, and wide, straight legs with creases.
Long dress in an airy weave with wide, asymmetric tiers in several layers and tie-top shoulder straps. Lined.

Straight-cut utility shirt in twill made from a soft Tencel™ lyocell blend in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar and classic front. Flap chest pockets with a pleat, shoulder tabs with a button, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in airy chiffon with broderie anglaise. V-neck with pin-tucks, buttons down the front, frill details at the top and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Parka in cotton twill with a lined, drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets with a flap. Adjustable press-stud fastenings at the cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Lined.

Parka in cotton twill with a lined, drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets with a flap. Adjustable press-stud fastenings at the cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with appliqués and embroidery. Fleece-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front, handwarmer pockets with a concealed zip and large, fleece-lined front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastener. The front pockets also conceal two fleece-lined side pockets. Adjustable hook and loop tab and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
